div.p: An optional sub-element in BIOGRAPHY DEATH . Fill in the keyref attributes once glossentry topics for the specified elements exist (use the id attribute on the glossentry element.

div.codeblock: 9 November 1969 VA died of <CAUSE>cancer</CAUSE> at her home in Frome, Vauchurch. November 1852 AAB died in London from <CAUSE>cancer of the uterus</CAUSE>.

div.p: If there was more than one cause for her death or if the cause of death is contested, include multiple cause elements.
